Class GameConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • view.GameConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameConsole
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class is the main view of the front end of the game console where the players will play the game and all other information while playing the game will be displayed.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    raghavsharda
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
